Mostly clear PERIOD Low near 35F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm





The Purdueowned SR22 singlepropellor plane landed in a field a half mile outside of the Frankfort Municipal Airport PERIOD

A Purdue student and flight instructor had to make an emergency landing in a field in Frankfort Indiana early Wednesday morning while on their way to Marion Indiana PERIOD

The singlepropellor Cirrus plane experienced  according to Purdue spokesperson Tim Doty PERIOD They then decided to divert to the Frankfort Municipal Airport but had to conduct an emergency landing in a field about half a mile away at  a.m PERIOD

No injuries were reported in the landing and it is unknown whether the plane will be flown back to Purdue or towed PERIOD The plane is owned by Purdue PERIOD
